description: This is an HTML file that serves as the frontend interface for a database viewer application. It provides the structure and styling for displaying databases, tables, and data, and includes embedded JavaScript code to dynamically fetch and render data from backend APIs.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting the UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders a data table in HTML format from provided data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual cell content, handling objects, nulls, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content that is too long or an object for better visibility.
